newsitem.title: SPAIN: SOCCER-BARCELONA SECRETLY NEGOTIATING WITH MARSEILLE - BLANC.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-BARCELONA SECRETLY NEGOTIATING WITH MARSEILLE - BLANC.

text.p: French international defender Laurent Blanc has accused Barcelona of failing to involve him in negotiations to transfer him to Olympique Marseille, according to articles in the Spanish press on Wednesday.
"Barca are negotiating my move to Marseille behind my back," said Blanc in comments published by the sports daily 'AS'.
"I have another year (of contract) and I would like to continue in the Camp Nou but the worst thing is that they talk without telling me if they want me next season," he said.
The Barcelona club declined to comment.
